And by cymbals someone turned them right down and EQ’d them on this 'hissy af' preset.
Listening to the new Metallica album. They always find a way to screw up the drum sound, don’t they? St. Anger = snare. This one = cymbals.

Doing Christmas stuff with @ntillbrook at @iamsamnorman and @saaamgiles’ place tonight and I could not be more excited.

Related, best lyrics of 2016: "I don’t make songs for free, I make them for freedom / Don’t believe in kings, believe in the Kingdom." 🙌🏼
Favourite release of 2016: Colouring Book. Sort-of a late entry, but I’m pretty sure nothing has made me feel better. Such a great record.
@alicaurusrex This is perfect.
Late entry for new pal of the year from @fubarpops, who made me an ace curry and sag aloo tonight. Also: great chats.
@AmazonHelp I’ve read this. I read it when it was sent to me an hour ago by yourselves. I’ve looked and can’t find it.
@AmazonHelp Not sure that really helps with me the parcel that’s apparently been delivered that I can’t find…
@AmazonHelp Why am I paying for Prime if I have to go on a hunt for my parcel?
@AmazonHelp That’d be Amazon Logistics.
@AmazonHelp If something’s been delivered to my "preferred safe place" but I didn’t set one, where is it likely to be hiding?
Classic @AmazonUK. Delivered something to my "preferred safe place", which I never specified. Almost definitely not renewing Prime now!
After writing a security thing for @iCreateMagazine recently, today I decided to take my own advice and make all my passwords unique. FUN.
@iamsamnorman So soon!
@iamsamnorman Bloody wish I was having a @Mageestbakery lunch with you.
@cjdowner I like to call that the invoice of broken dreams.

@CmonHarris Would argue they’re different at full size, not at Miniature Hero size, though.
@fubarpops I can handle that
